title: Tb on Android with 4 email accounts
creator: john.gaskell
content:
I have used Thunderbird (and previous) on Windows Laptop for many years. I have four emails accounts and addresses. I have just installed Thunderbird on android. It had a glitch, but it was unintuitive and not easy to fix. After install using the QR code, the first account was ok but the other 3 had an empty Outbox only. No error messages. The solution turned out to be: 

Settings - (select each email account in turn) - Fetching Mail - Incoming Server - follow the dialogue with Next as it logs in to the account, and allow permissions.

After doing this for email accts 2 3 and 4 it now works.

John Gaskell
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Adding folders
creator: dannyshamoon
content: My phone is a Samsung S20+ running Android 13. My Thunderbird is version 8.2 I can't seem to be able to add folders to any of my email accounts. Long pressing anywhere fails to do anything ie; on the account from the account pane, or the inbox. Thanks for the help. Danny
